A view given me June 27th
     Said my accompanying angel, \93Time is almost finished. Do ye reflect the lovely image of Jesus as ye should?\94 Then I was pointed to the earth, and saw that there would have to be a getting ready among those who have of late embraced the third angel's message. Said the angel, \93Get ready, get ready, get ready. Ye will have to die a greater death to the world than ye have ever yet died.\94 I saw that there was a great work to do for them, and but little time to do it in.
